No problem, love.

::Perndabot::

Perndabot nearly fell back as Biomass struck a shoulder into his 
chest, but a few steps backwards saved Perndabot's balance. He growls 
as his mind proccesses Biomass's last comment. The large bot levels 
his missile launcher at Biomass's head, which was heading toward the 
IF, attached to his body ... for now...

"Freeze, turn around, drop your weapons, and put your hands in the 
air," Perndabot says loudly enough for Biomass to hear, trying very 
hard to control his temper and not just attack this bot head on. 
Biomass had a very large missile launcher aimed at the back of his 
head, which was armed with two very dangerous missiles, which could 
be launched by a finger twitch of a very pissed off bot. Perndabot's 
finger tightened over the trigger.



--- In nbwrpg@y..., "Megan Solmonson" <tmrattrap@h...> wrote:
> 
> * Biomass was surprised that Perndabot hadn't made any move towards 
him by 
> now, perhaps there was a thought or something in his programming 
that was 
> holding him back. But it was his job to push buttons until he got 
the 
> reaction he was looking for, and to see where Perndabot snapped was 
just 
> that sort of reaction.
> He glanced down towards Nue'e when Perndabot reacted to her, 
lifting a brow, 
> realizing what she'd said before just now and giving Swift a side 
long 
> clance.
> Nue'e let go of Perndabot's finger after he had reacted to her, 
giving 
> Biomass that look again and getting a look back that told her not 
to worry. 
> She only sighed.
> < Must be the new body.>
> Biomass, narrowed his optics when he heard Perndabot's comeback, 
not feeling 
> insulted but knowing that he wasn;t going to leave what he said 
without a 
> responce. However, he could use the need to get to the Iron Fist as 
an 
> excuse to push this man just a little further before he placed him 
under his 
> concern and ignored him.
> Biomass's expression turned aggressive.*
> 
> " You have a striking point there. So, I'll leave you women to your 
> ammuseMENTS!" on the last word Biomass  struck to check his 
shoulder-plate 
> hard against Perndabot's arm as he passed by, the force enough to 
knock even 
> a bot Perndabot's size to the ground.
> Biomass, on the other hand, continued walking towards the Iron 
Fist, leaving 
> Nue'e to stand by Perndabot and stare at him in complete 
disbeliefe.*
>
